div.bibl: Die Fackel, Chicagoer Arbeiter Zeitung, Sunday,Aug. 1, 1880. (ADVERTISEMENT)Boys Hold Tight.' It comes nearer-ever nearer The Great Platt-German(Low German Speaking) People's Festival

body.p: combined with a fair in Ogdens-Grove, from 15th to 21st of August, 1880. All arrangements have been made. Everything has been fixed like a long drape with a new tape. (1) A real Hamburg mountain Pushcar under management of Prof. I.B. Bonfart from Hamburg.
(2( The letter of our Great men can be seen framed under glass Sunday and Monday at the place of the Festival. The skeptical Thomases are especially invited.
For what one sees,Black on white That's right. Sunday, August 15. Welcome to strangers.
The monster procession is Monday, August 16. The fireworks program comes later.
